Package com.linecorp.armeria.common

Class CacheControlBuilder<B extends CacheControlBuilder<B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.common.CacheControlBuilder<B>
  • Type Parameters:
    B - the self type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientCacheControlBuilder, ServerCacheControlBuilder
    public abstract class CacheControlBuilder<B extends CacheControlBuilder<B>>
extends Object
    A skeletal builder implementation of CacheControl. Use ServerCacheControlBuilder for building ServerCacheControl and ClientCacheControlBuilder for building ClientCacheControl.
    See Also:
    Cache-Control (MDN)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      protected CacheControlBuilder()
      Creates a new builder with all directives disabled initially.
      protected CacheControlBuilder​(CacheControl c)
      Creates a new builder using the specified CacheControl as the initial directives.
